title: Search No Further
description: Family secrets can kill in this twisty psychological suspense thriller from AJ Campbell, Amazon bestselling author of The Phone Call and Her Missing Husband.‘A mind-blowing psychological thriller which cements AJ Campbell as a master in this genre’ The Twist and Turn Book Blog ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Be careful who you trust... especially those closest to you.Cara De Rosa has it all. She’s the heart of her family and community; her restaurant business is booming, and she’s found a second chance at love. But there’s no such thing as a perfect life. And the good times never last forever.Because someone wants Cara dead.And she harbours a chilling suspicion it’s someone she knows.
author: A.J.     Campbell
